alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 11:44PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of San Bernardino and Riverside Counties through 1230 AM PDT... At 1144 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Baldwin Lake, or 7 miles northeast of Big Bear City, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Victorville, Hesperia, Apple Valley, Big Bear City, Lucerne Valley, Mount San Gorgonio, Onyx Summit, I-15 Between Victorville And Barstow, Lake Arrowhead, Adelanto, northwestern Desert Hot Springs, Big Bear Lake, Hwy 173 Between Lake Arrowhead And Hesperia, Hwy 18 Between Baldwin Lake And Lucerne Valley, Hwy 38 Between Yucaipa And Onyx Summit, Pioneertown, Hwy 18 Between Running Springs And Big Bear, Seven Oaks, Johnson Valley, and Hwy 38 Between Onyx Summit And Sugarloaf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
